com.complexible.stardog.sesame

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openrdf.repository.Repository

    public final class StardogRepository
extends org.openrdf.repository.base.AbstractRepository

    • Method Detail

      • setDataDir

        public void setDataDir(File theFile)
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - This method always throws this exception because the nominal data dir for the database backing this Repository is on a remote machine and as such, this invocation is not relevant.

      • getDataDir

        public File getDataDir()
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - This method always throws this exception because the nominal data dir for the database backing this Repository is on a remote machine and as such, this invocation is not relevant.

      • isWritable

        public boolean isWritable()
                   throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Returns true. Connections are presumed to be writable since this is the default setup for a Stardog database and there is no way to explicitly know w/o trying to do a write.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
